Name: Save the Planet
About the game: Naturally, your number one task is to kill the monsters! Just don’t let them cross the red line on the right. To do this, move monsters on the right to other rows and collect combinations of three identical monsters at the end of the line. But these monsters are tricky! With each step, if there’s no completed combination, the monsters shift one position to the right. Track your progress as you go and Save the Planet in 60 match3 levels with escalating complexity!
